staxel.village.dialogue.ErisLikedWagon.l: (안함)Oh, hello there. Can I interest you in any of my wares?
(안함)My...^c:d03e37;cart^c:pop;? I... I don't think I can sell you that... Or...
(안함)No. I'm afraid not. Even if I make an excellent profit, how will I carry the rest of my wares with me?
(안함)Or...are you offering to buy those out too? No?
(안함)I suppose...if you're interested...I could give you an old blueprint...
(안함)In return for monetary compensation, of course...
(안함)Hm. I'm afraid it doesn't seem you can afford that right now.
(안함)Come back with a bit more cash.
(안함)Now... If you should happen to find you need some of the rarer parts...
(안함)Feel free to come and consult with us!
